ForgotPasswordPage.title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPasswordPage.subtitle: Enter your email to receive an OTP code to reset your password.
ForgotPasswordPage.otp-sent: The OTP code has been sent to your email.
ForgotPasswordPage.otp-valid: Your OTP code has been successfully verified.
ForgotPasswordPage.otp-invalid: The OTP code is invalid or has expired.
ForgotPasswordPage.otp-get-error: An error occurred while retrieving the OTP code:

ForgotPasswordPage.sendOtpSuccess: Please check your email to get the 6-digit OTP code
ForgotPasswordPage.verifyEmailFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again.
